description: This file defines a React functional component 'Settings' that handles user interface for configuring notification channels, saving settings, and testing reminders. It interacts with an external API module 'SettingsApi' to load, toggle, update, and test notification preferences.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches current settings from the backend API and updates the component state.

methods.name: toggle
methods.description: Enables or disables a notification channel and updates the backend accordingly.

methods.name: onSave
methods.description: Saves the current settings to the backend API and notifies the user of the outcome.

methods.name: onTestSend
methods.description: Sends a test reminder using the current test email or phone, notifying the user upon success or failure.
